headline.main: White Resigns Allied Aid Post; To Stay as Honorary Chairman; Kansas Editor Pleads Press of Newspaper Duties and Age -- Suggests Successor Make It Full-Time Job -- Schism Is Denied

lead_paragraph: William Allen White announced in Emporia, Kan., yesterday his resignation as chairman of the Committee to Defend America by Aiding the Allies. He said he would retain the post until a successor was chosen. The new chairman may be selected within a few days.
abstract: White resigns as natl chmn; exec com replies; texts; schism within com denied
